page.title: 17The Arts in Loughton
page.content: { Drama}is quite strong in the Loughton area with the E.15 Acting School at the Corbett Theatre and the Loughton Amateur Dramatic Society (LADS), who hold their productions in Lopping Hall. Courses are run at the E.15 and also during the holidays for children at Oaklands School. There is an Art School at Epping Forest High where many{crafts}can be tried such as pottery and woodwork, and also activities such as film making and printing. Many people play{music}and there is plenty of opportunity to learn either privately or at the music school held at Epping Forest High or in many of the local junior schools. { Dance}is also well catered for in the locality with the opportunity to do ballet, modern dancing, tap and even the modern craze of break-dancing.
